game

Class MamboMarie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.MamboMarie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, VanishAbleActor

    public class MamboMarie
extends ZombieActor
implements VanishAbleActor
    Mambo Marie. This class is used to simulate the character Mambo Marie.

    Mambo Marie is able to create new zombies every 10 play turns and will vanish after 30 play turns. Mambo Marie will respawn until it is defeated.

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       Action lastAction,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        MamboMarie will performs an action based on its behaviours.

        On top of that, if she has played over 30 turns, she will disappear temporarily from the game map its currently on.

        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • stillVanished

        public boolean stillVanished()
        Description copied from interface: VanishAbleActor
        A method used to determine the chances of a VanishAbleActor reappearing on the game map.

        Implement this method to determine each individual actors chances of reappearing.

        Specified by:
        stillVanished in interface VanishAbleActor
        Returns:
        true if and only if actor reappears on game map, otherwise false.
